department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Jason Ulaszek leads the strategy and innovation practice at Manifest Digital. He has worked with some of the biggest and most influential brands in the country, helping them identify new business opportunities to improve brand awareness, customer satisfaction and loyalty. Jason is the Founder of UX for Good, an annual pro bono event that serves non-profits around the world by applying design-thinking practices to social challenges. He enjoys teaching, sharing practices developed over his career and bridging the gap between what's learned in the classroom and how it's applied in the real world working with clients.
